price: Então, a esses, quiçá, Allah os indulte. E Allah é Indulgente, Perdoador.
arabic: فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَعۡفُوَ عَنۡهُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَفُوًّا غَفُورٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fa-ulāika ʿasā al-lahu an yaʿfuwa ʿanhum wakāna al-lahu ʿafuwwan ghafūran
